---
title: "Isometric Primitives"
---

this node creates a *collection* of isometric crystal forms:

-   Tetrahedron
-   Octahedron
-   Rhombic
-   Dodecahedron
-   Pentagonal Dodecahedron
-   Deltoid Dodecahedron
-   Tristerahedron
-   Tetartoid
-   Hextetrahedron
-   Tetrahexahedron
-   Trapezohedron
-   Trisoctahedron
-   Diploid
-   Gyroid
-   Hexoctahedron

It is a [collection node](https://docs.blender.org/manual/en/latest/modeling/geometry_nodes/input/scene/collection_info.html).
